posts.post_content:
Fantastic eye appeal - date stamped "Oct 2 1911" on the reverse.

$55 per card ($210 for the group) - no additional charge for Paypal.  

These are sold as is (no returns) but they are all guaranteed to be authentic T206.

[IMG]http://collectiblesauctionplace.com/stampsf.jpg[/IMG]
